name: react-component-color
description: Color coding for JSX components based on Server/Client component type in React applications.

reactComponentColor.enable.description: Enable color coding for React components

reactComponentColor.serverComponent.back.description: Background color for Server Components (hex color code, empty to disable)

reactComponentColor.serverComponent.bord.description: Border color for Server Components (hex color code, empty to disable)

reactComponentColor.serverComponent.unde.description: Underline color for Server Components (hex color code, empty to disable)

reactComponentColor.serverComponent.text.description: Text color for Server Components (hex color code, empty to disable)

reactComponentColor.clientComponent.back.description: Background color for Client Components (hex color code, empty to disable)

reactComponentColor.clientComponent.bord.description: Border color for Client Components (hex color code, empty to disable)

reactComponentColor.clientComponent.unde.description: Underline color for Client Components (hex color code, empty to disable)

reactComponentColor.clientComponent.text.description: Text color for Client Components (hex color code, empty to disable)

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
